3. City Council

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 5 pm
* 1st and 3rd Tuesday of every month
* University Park City Hall  
  3800 University Boulevard  
  Council Chambers  
  University Park, TX 75205

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://uptexas.org/327/Council-Minutes-Agendas)

Contact the City Council
------------------------

To contact the City Council, in order that your request can be addressed as quickly as possible, contact the City Secretary at 214-987-5302. The City Secretary will take your name and number and have the appropriate Council member contact you. Communication with the Mayor and individual Council members is also possible by letter or email.

The City Hall mailing address is:  
3800 University Boulevard  
University Park, TX 75205

You can also [send a group email to the City Council](mailto:city-council@uptexas.org).

Duties & Requirements
---------------------

Learn more about Council duties and requirements by visiting the [Election page](https://uptexas.org/356/Election).
